Lead a team of 31 associate members to ensure the effective functioning of the organization.

Involved in on-campus publicity and event management of two-day events like Go-Kart, Rappelling, Zipline, Laser Tag, etc.

experience.title: Design Team Member
experience.description: Spring Fest is the annual Social and Cultural fest of IIT Kharagpur, West Bengal held in the month of January.With a three-tier team of 25 members publicized and promoted events through online and offline media channels. Designed the arena for over 20 major sponsors and making theme based decorative installations.
